title: Countdown to freedom? OJ Simpson's big day!
itunes:title: Countdown to freedom? OJ Simpson's big day!
description:
OJ Simpson could be walking your streets in October if the Nevada parole board decides Thursday he's done enough time for a 2007 robbery and kidnapping. OJ's former prison guard Jeffrey Felix, journalist Art Harris, forensic psychologist Daniel Bober and Nancy Grace debate the question in this episode leading up to the parole hearing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
